title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select File -> Export and choose 'Zip File' to export
4.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name but under different directories to a zip file, the export fails.
EB: When exporting multiple files with the same name but under different directories to a zip file, the export should succeed and all files should be included in the zip file, maintaining their original directory structure.
SR:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select File -> Export and choose 'Zip File' to export
4. Verify that the export process completes successfully and all files with the same name but under different directories are included in the zip file with their original directory structure intact.
